BKMM.summary: Bekem Metals, Inc. explores and produces mineral properties. It provides exploration of nickel, cobalt, and brown coal. Bekem Metals, Inc. was formerly known as Condesa Pacific, S.A. and changed its name to Bekem Metals, Inc. in March, 2005. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Aktobe, Kazakhstan with an additional office location in Salt Lake City, Utah.
